LanguageData.IdeoDiverity_Abhorrent_AltarSharing.stag: The altar of a false belief is in the room with our {ALTAR_labelShort}! It's a disgusting violation of our sanctity.
LanguageData.IdeoDiverity_Disapproved_AltarSharing.st: The altar of a false belief is in the room with our {ALTAR_labelShort}. It's wrong.
LanguageData.IdeoDiverity_Horrible_AltarSharing.stage: The altar of a false belief is in the room with our {ALTAR_labelShort}. It's a violation of our sanctity.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Abhorrent.stages.diverse_t: My truth is so pure and obvious, yet some of those around me are captured by evil. It's abhorrent.
My truth is so pure and obvious, yet many of those around me are captured by evil. It's abhorrent.
My truth is so pure and obvious, yet almost all of those around me are captured by evil. It's abhorrent.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Abhorrent_ParticipatedInOt: I am offended at myself for taking part in a false belief's ritual.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Abhorrent_StyleDominance.s: I am surrounded by constructions which match the style(s) that reflect my {ADJECTIVE} beliefs. My beliefs are reflected by these styles: {STYLES}
I am surrounded by constructions that do not match the style(s) that reflect my {ADJECTIVE} beliefs. My beliefs are reflected by these styles: {STYLES}
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Abhorrent_Uniform.stages.u: Our community is free from evil thoughts, as it should be.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Approved.stages.diverse_th: Some others here have different beliefs. It's a sign of a healthy community.
Many others here have different beliefs. It's a sign of a healthy community.
Almost all others here have different beliefs. It's a sign of a healthy community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Approved_StyleDominance.st: My surroundings are very {ADJECTIVE}. That's fine, but a diverse environment would be better.
My surroundings are not at all {ADJECTIVE}. I enjoy the diversity.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Disapproved.stages.diverse: My truth is clear, yet some of those around me are so foolish they can't see it. I don't like being subjected to their idiocy.
My truth is clear, yet many of those around me are so foolish they can't see it. I don't like being subjected to their idiocy.
My truth is clear, yet almost all of those around me are so foolish they can't see it. I don't like being subjected to their idiocy.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Disapproved_ParticipatedIn: It feels strange taking part in a false belief's ritual.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Disapproved_StyleDominance: I am surrounded by constructions which match the style(s) that reflect my {ADJECTIVE} beliefs. My beliefs are reflected by these styles: {STYLES}
I am surrounded by constructions that do not match the style(s) that reflect my {ADJECTIVE} beliefs. My beliefs are reflected by these styles: {STYLES}
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Disapproved_Uniform.stages: Our community is free of foolishness, as it should be.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Exalted.stages.diverse_tho: Some others here have different beliefs. I'm so proud to be part of such a community.
Many others here have different beliefs. I'm so proud to be part of such a community.
Almost all others here have different beliefs. I'm so proud to be part of such a community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Exalted_StyleDominance.sta: My surroundings are very {ADJECTIVE}. That's fine, but a diverse environment would be better.
My surroundings are not at all {ADJECTIVE}. I'm very happy to be part of this diverse community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Horrible.stages.diverse_th: My truth is so obvious, yet some of those around me are so deluded. It's horrible.
My truth is so obvious, yet many those around me are so deluded. It's horrible.
My truth is so obvious, yet almost all of those around me are so deluded. It's horrible.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Horrible_ParticipatedInOth: I am disappointed in myself for taking part in a false belief's ritual.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Horrible_StyleDominance.st: I am surrounded by constructions which match the style(s) that reflect my {ADJECTIVE} beliefs. My beliefs are reflected by these styles: {STYLES}
I am surrounded by constructions that do not match the style(s) that reflect my {ADJECTIVE} beliefs. My beliefs are reflected by these styles: {STYLES}
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Horrible_Uniform.stages.un: Our community is free of filthy delusions, as it should be.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Respected.stages.diverse_t: Some others here have different beliefs. It's an important sign of a healthy community.
Many others here have different beliefs. It's an important sign of a healthy community.
Almost all others here have different beliefs. It's an important sign of a healthy community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Respected_StyleDominance.s: My surroundings are very {ADJECTIVE}. That's fine, but a diverse environment would be better.
My surroundings are not at all {ADJECTIVE}. I am happy to be a part of a diverse community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Standard_StyleDominance.st: I am surrounded by constructions which match the style(s) that reflect my {ADJECTIVE} beliefs. My beliefs are reflected by these styles: {STYLES}

I am surrounded by non-{ADJECTIVE} constructions. That's fine, but I'd prefer being in a more {ADJECTIVE} environment with constructions that match style(s) that reflect my {ADJECTIVE} beliefs. My beliefs are reflected by these styles: {STYLES}
